message: Laurie I agree with you. Sad part here is we have a public transportation system called metro that is used for seniors, people with disabilities and special needs and not long ago one of their drivers did the same thing! Seriously you have people with major problems and you didn't check your bus?

We grew up with this stuff.....how is it against the law. Now. Your right...HOA morons have no life....afraid it will ruin property values.....it will be gone after the first rain and wind. So let the kids have a real childhood memory.
